text: Nice new park easily accessible from the nearby estate and the main road. Some traffic sounds can be heard. There is ample seating and a nice playground. There is also an open space. The garden along the side is small but beautiful.
A small and quiet neighbourhood park with a rubber tyre art installation to reflect the area's history. Can pay a visit on the way to the AMK Linear Park and Luxus Hills Park.
Brand new neighbourhood park off Ang Mo Kio Avenue 5 with a playground, fitness corner, and community garden.
Serene and nice, compact but big air space.

The park is small but yet serves its purpose for small children residing in the nearby Land Properties to gather and play on the trampolines, swings and the Playground. Definitely not as big as other parks/playground like Sengkang Riverside Park.
